sentences.simplifiedText: 官先生是我们的新邻居，他刚从广州搬来。
sentences.traditionalText: 官先生是我們的新鄰居，他剛從廣州搬來。
sentences.pinyin: guān xiān shēng shì wǒ men de xīn lín jū, tā gāng cóng guǎng zhōu bān lái.
sentences.translation: Mr. Guan is our new neighbor, he just moved here from Guangzhou.

sentences.pinyin: tā de fù qīn shì gè guān.
sentences.translation: His father is a government official.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他的父亲年轻时是个官，现在他已经退休，享受他的养老金。
sentences.traditionalText: 他的父親年輕時是個官，現在他已經退休，享受他的養老金。
sentences.pinyin: tā de fù qīn nián qīng shí shì gè guān, xiàn zài tā yǐ jīng tuì xiū, xiǎng shòu tā de yǎng lǎo jīn.
sentences.translation: His father was a government official when he was young, now he has retired and enjoys his pension.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在这个国家，做一个清廉的官员是非常重要的。
sentences.traditionalText: 在這個國家，做一個清廉的官員是非常重要的。
sentences.pinyin: zài zhège guójiā, zuò yīgè qīnglián de guānyuán shì fēicháng zhòngyào de.
sentences.translation: In this country, being a clean official is very important.

sentences.pinyin: Tā de qìguān nénglì tǐng qiáng.
sentences.translation: His organ function is quite strong.

sentences.simplifiedText: 医生告诉他，虽然他的器官有些问题，但并非无法治愈。
sentences.traditionalText: 醫生告訴他，雖然他的器官有些問題，但並非無法治癒。
sentences.pinyin: Yīshēng gàosù tā, suīrán tā de qìguān yǒuxiē wèntí, dàn bìngfēi wúfǎ zhìhù.
sentences.translation: The doctor told him that although his organs have some problems, they are not incurable.
